{{item.id}} {{item.email}} {{item.first_name}} {{item.last_name}} {{item.avatar}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedService } from "./service/shared.service"; export interface MyData { id: number; email: string; first_name: string; last_name: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'smartypants'; userData:any =[]; td:any; empData:any[]=[]; constructor(private ser:SharedService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getData1(); this.getData2(); } getData1(){ this.ser.getBackData1().subscribe((res:any)=>{ this.userData = res; this.userData['data'].forEach((item:any)=> { this.empData.push(item); }) console.log(res); }) } getData2(){ this.ser.getBackData2().subscribe((res:any)=>{ this.userData = res; this.userData['data'].forEach((item:any)=> { this.empData.push(item); }) console.log("empData",this.empData); }) } }
